mean_cn: n. 专家，领袖，古鲁（指印度教等宗教的宗师或领袖）
mean_en: a recognized leader in some field or of some movement; a Hindu or Buddhist religious leader and spiritual teacher; each of the first ten leaders of the Sikh religion
sentence: Financial gurus can offer professional advice, helping you to make more money.
sentence_trans: 金融大师们可以给你专业建议，让你挣更多的钱。
